title: Success
description: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

title: Change
description: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.

title: Wisdom
description: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.

title: Inspiration
description: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

title: Courage
description: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.

title: Hope
description: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.

title: Dreams
description: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.

title: Perseverance
description: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.

title: Love
description: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.

title: Imagination
description: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.

title: Strength
description: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.

title: Kindness
description: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.

title: Opportunity
description: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.

title: Gratitude
description: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.

title: Wisdom
description: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

title: Life
description: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

title: Optimism
description: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

title: Creativity
description: Creativity is intelligence having fun.

title: Purpose
description: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

title: Happiness
description: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
